mapper.select: SELECT A.VHC_ID ,A.VHC_NO ,B.DVC_ID FROM BMS_VHC_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_DVC_INFO B ON A.VHC_ID = B.VHC_ID WHERE MNG_ID = #{MNG_ID}
SELECT ROUT_NM FROM BMS_ROUT_MST WHERE ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID}

SELECT NODE_ID AS NEXT_NODE_ID ,NODE_NM AS NEXT_NODE_NM ,NODE_SN AS NEXT_NODE_SN ,NODE_TYPE AS NEXT_NODE_TYPE ,( SELECT PRV_PLCE_NM FROM BRT_CUR_OPER_INFO WHERE OPER_DT = #{OPER_DT} AND ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND VHC_NO = #{BUS_NO} ) AS PREV_NODE_NM FROM BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN WHERE ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND NODE_SN > #{NODE_SN} AND NODE_TYPE IN ('NT001', 'NT002') ORDER BY NODE_SN ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT NODE_ID ,NODE_NM ,NODE_TYPE FROM BMS_NODE_MST WHERE NODE_ID = #{NODE_ID}
